!Keucereus: Are you an adventurer from Aden? Many of your comrades have already traveled here. I am truly grateful. Despite our lands' ancient hostility towards each other, it warms my heart to see these new bonds of friendship form between us. With your help, I hope to restore Gracia to its former glory...
